title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.22 - Allowance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.22 - Allowance

State Regulations

The difference between gross revenue from services
rendered and amounts received (or to be received) from patients or third-party
payors. Allowances are to be distinguished from uncollectible accounts
resulting from credit losses. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
451.22

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
